prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon that resembles a round, fluffy mammal with a pink nose.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in snowy environments, with a brown body and a white underbelly.
Show me a Pokemon that can burrow underground, with a compact shape and small limbs.
Design a Pokemon with a unique blend of earth and ice attributes, featuring a rounded shape.
Give me a Pokemon that loves cold climates, showcasing a small, brown creature with a cuddly appearance.
Generate a Pokemon characterized by its ability to find food buried in snow, with a tiny stature.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a baby boar, with distinctive colors and playful behavior.
